rules.description: Change control to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
CAPS LOCK + hjkl to arrow keys
vim-preview: map jk (down/up)
vim preview: map JK (previous / next page)
vim-preview: map hl (left / right)
vim-preview: map HL (previous / next position)
vim-preview: map zoom (9/0/-/=)
vim-preview: map gG (go to first / last page)
Caps lock and 1234...890-+ to F1..F12
right command to ` if pressed alone
right command + H to left arrow
right command + J to down arrow
right command + K to up arrow
right command + L to right arrow
right command + E to end of line
right command + A to begin of line
right command + W to word forward (option + right arrow)
right command + B to word backward
right command + U to page up
right command + D to page down
right command + Y to yark
right command + P to paste
right command + S to delete till begin of line
right command + C to delete current line
right command + left shift + C to delete till end of line
Simultaneously press Equals + Del to get a ForwardDel
shift + backspace to delete
; to right shift
s to ctrl when held
d to cmd + alt when held
Autoshift Numbers only: Post number if pressed alone, shifted number row key if held down
f + hjkl to arrow keys
A to left shift
left Shift to control+Space if alone
left Shift to control+Space if alone
f + hjkl to arrow keys
f + uiyo to shift + arrow keys
f + nm,. to home/pgup/pgdown/end
Post S if pressed alone, right_ctrl otherwise
shift + backspace to delete
Simultaneously press Equals + Del to get a ForwardDel
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Trigger Escape by comma and period
Trigger tab by m and comma
x and c cbombo -> left_control + spacebar, for switch input type in mac OS.
Post semicolon if pressed alone, right_shift otherwise
f + spacebar to enter
f + slash to backslash
j + r
Simultaneously press KL to ctrl
Simultaneously press JK to ctrl
Simultaneously press s + h to get a ctrl h
Simultaneously press s + j to get a ctrl j
Simultaneously press s + k to get a ctrl k
Simultaneously press s + l to get a ctrl l
combo w and o to cmd + space
w + o to cmd + space
simultaneous u and o to post ctrl A
